sources.title: PDF
sources.snippet: The proposed acquisition would combine the activities of LSEG and Refinitiv. LSEG operates trading venues (e.g. through MTS) and clearing houses. It also offers financial data products, such as trading data from the London Stock Exchange and the FTSE100 equity index. Refinitiv offers financial data products, such as desktop services and datafeeds.
